tool_description:
This API provides up to date information on cryptocurrency.

name: Crpytonux
title: Crpytonux

api_list.name: Current Crypto news
api_list.description: Provides current information on cryptocurrency from various sources. #LucidVisionaryENT
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crpytonux.p.rapidapi.com/cryptonuu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crpytonux.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crpytonux.p.rapidapi.com/cryptonuu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crpytonux.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
